Sivaji Adurthy wrote:

> Hi,
> I am trying to use this crawler to build a search engine , has any one 
> had any experience , any problems encountered , please share ur 
> experiences .

We've done a few experiments trying to make ARC files, the default 
product of a Heritrix crawl, searchable. Mostly this has consisted of 
trying to get ARC content into Nutch (An embryonic, underexecised 
Nutch-injection tool can be found here: 
http://cvs.sourceforge.net/viewcvs.py/archive-access/archive-access/projects/nutch/. 
It lacks packaging and it runs too slow).

St.Ack

> what other s/w u had used besides hertrix and how u have integrated them.
> thanks
> sivaji
